I've decided to introduce myself for reasons that are no longer clear to me, so hello. I lurked around the forums (especially the science labs, that place is great/awful) for a few months before buying the game, then made an account and promptly proceeded to not post. I might be changing that now, I'm really not sure, but the main lesson to take away is that I'm a bit creepy (hence the extended lurk).

Regarding the game, I managed a few Mun-and-return landings in the demo before buying the game, and quite a few more Mun-stranded landings. I want to thank pretty much anyone who's ever posted in the gameplay questions forums, as I never would have landed on either moon or Duna and Eve without you.
